comment: Thats a great idea! Were really behind schedule here in Minnesota, still in phase one. It will be awhile for me, but my parents are next and that will be such a relief.
amr:
# ::snt Thats a great idea! Were really behind schedule here in Minnesota, still in phase one. It will be awhile for me, but my parents are next and that will be such a relief.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / idea
            :domain (t / that)
            :mod (g / great))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (b / behind
                  :op1 (s / schedule-01)
                  :degree (r / really)
                  :location (h / here
                        :location (s2 / state
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Minnesota"))))
            :op2 (p / phase
                  :mod 1
                  :mod (s3 / still)))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (l / last-01
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
                  :ARG2 (a2 / awhile)
                  :ARG3 (ii3 / i))
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (n2 / next
                        :domain (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 ii3
                                    :ARG2 (p3 / parent))))
                  :op2 (r2 / relieve-01
                        :ARG0 n2
                        :degree (s4 / such)))))

comment: Thanks gigi! I wanna document my vaccine journey so lay people feel more comfortable receiving the vaccine later !
amr:
# ::snt Thanks gigi! I wanna document my vaccine journey so lay people feel more comfortable receiving the vaccine later !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Gigi")))
      :snt2 (w / want-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (d / document-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (j / journey-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (v / vaccine)))
            :purpose (f / feel-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :mod (l / lay))
                  :ARG1 (c / comfortable-02
                        :ARG0 (r / receive-01
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 v
                              :time (a / after
                                    :op1 (n2 / now)))
                        :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG1 p2
                              :ARG3 (m2 / more))))))
